entry.title: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code
entry.content: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

entry.title: https://github.com/awslabs/git-secrets
entry.content: Prevents you from committing secrets and credentials into git repositories

entry.title: https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz
entry.content: OSS-Fuzz - continuous fuzzing for open source software.

entry.title: https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm
entry.content: Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

entry.title: https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh
entry.content: 🙃 A delightful community-driven (with 2,400+ contributors) framework for managing your zsh configuration. Includes 300+ optional plugins (rails, git, macOS, hub, docker, homebrew, node, php, python, etc), 140+ themes to spice up your morning, and an auto-update tool that makes it easy to keep up with the latest updates from the community.

entry.title: https://github.com/ophub/amlogic-s9xxx-openwrt
entry.content: Support for OpenWrt in Amlogic, Rockchip and Allwinner boxes. Support a311d, s922x, s905x3, s905x2, s912, s905d, s905x, s905w, s905, s905l, rk3588, rk3568, rk3399, rk3328, h6, etc.

entry.title: https://github.com/youngyangyang04/leetcode-master
entry.content: 《代码随想录》LeetCode 刷题攻略：200道经典题目刷题顺序，共60w字的详细图解，视频难点剖析，50余张思维导图，支持C++，Java，Python，Go，JavaScript等多语言版本，从此算法学习不再迷茫！🔥🔥 来看看，你会发现相见恨晚！🚀

entry.title: https://github.com/yuaotian/go-cursor-help
entry.content: 解决Cursor在免费订阅期间出现以下提示的问题: Your request has been blocked as our system has detected suspicious activity / You've reached your trial request limit. / Too many free trial accounts used on this machine.
